title: Blended Learning Design for Enhancing Business Foreign Language Competencies

context.additional_context: Work-centered foreign language education for office workers. Provides a flexible learning environment combining non-face-to-face tools and face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use formal style and key expressions in business emails with over 80% accuracy
Learners perform over 70% of communication using specialized terminology in video conference simulations
Learners can interpret work-related information in business documents (contracts, reports, etc.) with 90% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
